extendedInfo.description: The way we see it at Cracker Barrel Old Country StoreÂ®, being part restaurant and part store often adds up to one enjoyable visit. On one hand, our restaurant offers hearty homestyle meals. Plus, breakfast all day, every day. And on the other, weâre an old country store filled with unique gifts and items you may need for your trip. Together, we like to think they make a welcome stop for anyone traveling around the corner or across the country.Now, with this official Cracker Barrel Locator Android Application, you can find the nearest Cracker Barrel when youâre traveling.Features:Â· Find a Cracker Barrel using your "Current Location"Â· Find a Cracker Barrel by Zip Code or City & StateÂ· Get Maps and Driving Directions to any LocationOpen Sunday -Thursday 6 a.m.-10 p.m.;Friday & Saturday 6 a.m-11 p.m.www.crackerbarrel.com

reviews.title: Ok,  could be better
reviews.comment: Works on Note 2 with Android Jelly Bean & Google Navigation. Would be nice to have a call-ahead phone number,  view menu, ... kind of plain compared to other Android apps out there.
reviews.author: Carr Taliaferro

reviews.comment: Would be nice to have more info other than just the closest locations. Side note to jarrod\'s comment; there will never be a CB in CA... not allowed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: CB is for road trips. Even if you can\'t show me locations on my route, show me a map. Don\'t make me pick from a list. Closest may not be best.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great if you just need the closest one or you know the zip code... but won\'t let you look up by city/state... I have to look up zip with another app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buggy locater service
reviews.comment: Does nothing but locate Cracker Barrels. Kinda buggy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works like a charm! Don\'t forget to put on your GPS function. Love this app. Cracker Barrel candy stops are a highlight for our family vacations.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Worthless ap. Only shows store locations. Should at least have menu and special items.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This was disappointing. A directions-only app gets two stars. When you add a menu and product listings from your store, I\'ll improve the rating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No purpose
reviews.comment: Please make app so that you can view menu and prices.  Maybe even be able to order take out online.....  the Bob Evans app is capable of those things and is really convenient.
reviews.author: Selina Lewis

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Didn\'t work on my HTC inspire. Says it can\'t connect to the internet, bit there is nothing wrong with my connection. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Review for:running on HTC Incredible: Force closes, a lot. Does not show me a map to various locations. You need to know the zip code to be able to find the restaurant. You can look up the zip code with the app but that seems silly.  Probably the worst app of this sort I have ever used.  I LOVE Cracker Barrel <3 <3 <3,  Their food and waitstaff are consistently awesome. I wish they would hire a company to develop their app that put that type of passion and attention to detail into developing a Cracker Barrel app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: Totally useless on my android.  You have to know the zip code to look up the cracker barrel.   Well that is totally useless if I\'m on the road and I want to know where the nearest CBs are , say , in the state of Georgia.  Having it pop up a map would be a lot more useful.  And yes I have my GPS on.   I think that maybe my Garmin GPS might do a better job.
reviews.author: foxhound171n

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Awesome. But add the peg jump game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app but room for improvement
reviews.comment: I like that I can use my GPS to find  a CB as they are my fav place to eat when traveling.  I have to agree with other reviewers that some additional info about the location would be nice -type of parking/wifi/electric car charging stations (if I remember correctly I read you are testing car charging stations in one state, can\'t remember which one though).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: CV app
reviews.comment: Works just fine on my HTC inspire
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So so app
reviews.comment: I was happy to see it uses my location, but it doesn\'t give any store info other than location and number. I\'d like to know hours and type of parking a available as I often pull my trailer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Need to be able to pull up a map so you can find the next one on your route.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Agree. This app blows. Did not work once.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome Service
reviews.comment: Selma/Smithfield  location is awesome friendly service, our server went above an beyond service,( Charlene) if you get her she is awesome, even I in the store , very friendly staff.
reviews.author: Aretta Flores

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Fast and easy to find....
reviews.author: A Google User
